import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axiosInstance from '../../intercept'; import UnitAddEdit from './UnitAddEdit'; class UnitManagement extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { unitData: [], addModalShow: false, }; } componentDidMount() { this.loadUsers(); } loadUsers = () => { const token = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('token')) console.log(token.token); if (token) { console.log('105 line'); axiosInstance.get('/units/', { headers: { 'Authorization': `token ${token.token}` } }) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data) this.setState({ unitData: res.data.reverse() }) }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error) }) } else { alert('No token here') } } render() { return (
{/* DM form */}

{unit_data.name} {unit_data.status === true ? 'Active' : 'Pending'}

); } } export default UnitManagement;
